CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Figure 8 shows that the J-V characteristics of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / TiO x / Al devices provide a similar trend to those of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / LiF / Al devices but their PCEs increased mainly due to increased short circuit currents.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| ITO |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| polymer |
| PC71BM |
| TiO x |
| Al |
| LiF |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

I apologize for my previous mistake. Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| ITO |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| PC71BM |
| TiO x |
| Al |

These are the materials mentioned in the paragraph that are relevant to the context of material names. The other entities mentioned, such as "LiF" and "PCEs", are not relevant to the context of material names and have been excluded from the table.

Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Figure 8 shows that the J-V characteristics of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / TiO x / Al devices provide a similar trend to those of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / LiF / Al devices but their PCEs increased mainly due to increased short circuit currents.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| J-V characteristics |
| PCEs |
| short circuit currents |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with only the entities that clearly refer to material properties:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| J-V characteristics |
| PCEs |

The following entities do not clearly refer to material properties and were removed:

* "short circuit currents" (not a property of a material)
* "LiF" (not a property of a material, but a chemical compound)
* "TiO x" (not a property of a material, but a chemical compound)
* "Al" (not a property of a material, but a chemical element)
